text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo .@WhiteHouse 

You are aware that the coronavirus has made it to the White House, right? 

What’s their average age?

Yet no face masks.

No 6 Ft between people. 

You are supposed to lead by example.

More importantly, you are putting people at risk.

#coronavirus #COVID19
